detection.message: cvc-complex-type.2.4.a: Invalid content was found starting with element '{"urn:hl7-org:v3":author}'. One of '{"urn:hl7-org:v3":approachSiteCode, "urn:hl7-org:v3":doseQuantity, "urn:hl7-org:v3":rateQuantity, "urn:hl7-org:v3":maxDoseQuantity, "urn:hl7-org:v3":administrationUnitCode, "urn:hl7-org:v3":subject, "urn:hl7-org:v3":specimen, "urn:hl7-org:v3":consumable}' is expected.
